column2: Separatists have abandoned all attempts at national improvement. They only want independence, and will vote against all reforms.
column3: Separatists have abandoned all attempts at national improvement. They only want independence, and will vote against all reforms.
column4: Separatists have abandoned all attempts at national improvement. They only want independence, and will vote against all reforms.
column6: Los separatistas han abandonado todos los intentos de mejora nacional. Sólo quieren independencia y votarán en contra de todas las reformas.

column2: Patriot rebels dream of unification with their cultural kin under a free banner, and any province they gain control of will eventually defect to a neighboring country of their culture.
column3: Patriot rebels dream of unification with their cultural kin under a free banner, and any province they gain control of will eventually defect to a neighboring country of their culture.
column4: Patriot rebels dream of unification with their cultural kin under a free banner, and any province they gain control of will eventually defect to a neighboring country of their culture.
column6: Los rebeldes patriotas sueñan con la unificación con sus parientes culturales bajo una bandera libre, y cualquier provincia que controlen acabará desertando hacia un país vecino de su cultura.
